isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - AIR CONDITIONING BASIC THEORY, SYSTEM DIAGNOSIS AND SERVICE (WITH R-12 REFRIGERANT SYSTEM) - SPECIAL SERVICE TOOLS - MANIFOLD AND GAUGE SET

svcproc.title: MANIFOLD AND GAUGE SET
svcproc.para: The manifold gauge set (OEM-1392 for R-12 systems or OEM-1419 for HFC-134A systems) consists of the necessary pressure and vacuum gauges, and control valves and fittings for evacuating and charging air conditioner systems ( Figure 23). The unit features sidewheel style, color-coded valve handles, 2-1/2" vibration-free gauges, hose holders, a hanging hook, hoses with "Quick- Seal" couplings for R-12 systems and metric SAE quick-disconnect fittings (with valves) for HFC-134A systems. The hose connection fittings on the manifold and gauge set for HFC-134A have Acme threads.
